title: Nautica Men's N17612G NST 02 Classic Analog Watch
features: Durable mineral crystal protects watch from scratches
description: Casual watch, Japanese quartz movement, Multifunction featuring 24-hour, day and date subdials, Matte silver-tone sword hands with luminous accents and orange sweep seconds, Applied matte silver-tone Arabic twelve, Applied luminescent matte silver-tone baton markers, White print, Arabic numbers and indices mark subdials, White Arabic numbers and indices form surrounding minute track, Black dial with textured grid pattern and white logo below twelve o'clock, Matte black polyurethane strap with perforated texture, contrast stitching and brushed silver-tone stainless steel buckle, Polished silver-tone stainless steel bezel with black/red top ring, luminescent dot hour marker and silver Arabic numbers/baton markers/indices, Brushed silver-tone stainless steel round case with polished detailing, Textured steel screw-down crown with engraved logo, Stainless steel screw-down caseback, Mineral crystal, 10 ATM (100 meters/330 feet water resistant)

Introduced in 1994, Nautica Watches for men and women combine distinctive styling, bold colors and unique design. Inspired by sailing, the Nautica brand reflects an energetic lifestyle that appeals to consumers around the globe. Nautica Watches fuse the best of classic American style with the latest in technical innovation.

Founded in 1983, NauticaÂ® is a leading global lifestyle brand ranging from men's, women's and children's apparel and accessories to a complete home collection. In 2003, the Company was acquired by VF Corporation, a global leader in branded lifestyle apparel with more than 30 brands.
